name: hyperapp
description: 1kb JavaScript library for building frontend applications.
author: Jorge Bucaran

scripts.perf: npm run build -s && npm run size -s && npm run bench -s && npm run trace -s
scripts.size: npm run build && zopfli dist/hyperapp.js > dist/hyperapp.js.gz && stat -f%z dist/hyperapp.js.gz && rm dist/hyperapp.js.gz
scripts.release: npm run build && npm test && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
